description: Phase that allows attaching an external file to the batch by specifying a link.
intent: To attach an external file during recipe execution and publish recipe variables with attachment details.

inputs.Link: Base file link. Any valid link location.

outputs.AttachedFileCount: Number of files attached by the phase (integer).
outputs.AttachedFileNames: DataTable with a single FILENAME column containing each attached file name.

postconditions: Recipe variables AttachedFileCount and AttachedFileNames are created and populated.
example_usage: In a recipe, author adds an Add External File phase, sets Link to a network path (e.g. \\fileserver\specs\doc.pdf). At runtime, the file is attached and the phase publishes AttachedFileCount = 1 and AttachedFileNames containing 'doc.pdf'.
